questions.question_text: Do manufacturers often publish one set of instructions for different models of the same series of appliances?

options.A: Work order directs you to check out operation of the relay controlling heating/cooling thermostat = Wiring Schematic
options.B: New door switch required = Parts Assembly Chart including Parts Numbers
options.C: Customer lives in a remote area and inquires whether there is some reference he can use if dryer malfunctions on the weekend = Common Problem Troubleshooting Guide
options.D: Customer wants to know how to program thermostat = Operatorâ€™s Manual
